abstract: DealBook Online; auto parts supplier Delphi Automotive will acquire HellermannTyton Group for 1.07 billion pounds, or about $1.7 billion.
lead_paragraph: The deal is expected to complement Delphi’s existing business of providing electronics components to the auto industry and to enhance its Asian business.

headline.main: Delphi Automotive Agrees to Buy HellermannTyton for $1.7 Billion

snippet: The deal is expected to complement Delphi’s existing business of providing electronics components to the auto industry and to enhance its Asian business.
